data.title: Just damp good beer!
data.text:
Small handcrafted brewing company with about six different on tap brews located in old down town Madera turned out to be a pleasant surprise.
Michael Tate, CEO,  President & Founder has brought his talent to wake up the beer pallets in Madera.
Small pub now but sion will be differing some food for its customers.
Beer on tap, bottles to go too.

data.title: In a location where history goes back to the 1800's Three Monkeys is an awesome, much needed place in Madera.
data.text: I remember walking the busy streets of downtown Madera with my grandfather as a kid.  We would pass the barber shops, banks, clothing stores, and bakeries.  That was 25 years ago and much has changed. Three monkeys is a breath of fresh air to the downtown area, and is already giving new life to old Yosemite Street.  The establishment is very classy, clean, friendly staff, and most important GREAT BEER!  They have many different styles to quench any man's thirst.  Talk 2 minutes with the owners and staff and you can see passion they have for their Craft Brew.  Give me a Tres Vaqueros in a tall glass and front patio view of my home town and you have a very happy man!  CHEERS!
